title: Edu. Ministry to provide meals for schoolchildren
body_lines: The attention was drawn by the Education Ministry to provide lunch for the schoolchildren, Education Minister Susil Premajayantha said.
Addressing the media, he said he strongly believes that schoolchildren should be provided with a meal in the face of financial difficulties faced by parents.
The Minister said the problems that are currently being created in the education field, are due to acting without proper methodology. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
